messages.subject: Seeing and hearing (other ways of learning about unschooling)
messages.msgSnippet: A visual graph of unschooling connections: http://webbrain.com/u/10Cj I ll be in on an interview Monday at 11:30 my time.  That leaves me time to do the Monday
messages.messageBody:
A visual graph of unschooling connections:
http://webbrain.com/u/10Cj

I'll be in on an interview Monday at 11:30 my time. That leaves me
time to do the Monday afternoon chat. <g>

I'm still trying to figure out how it all works, but definitely the
discussion will be available for free download later (maybe
immediately after; not sure). It seems, perhaps, it won't work for
Macs. I'll be on the phone anyway.

I'm still working on setting up an announcement, but here's the intro:

http://www.seedwiki.com/wiki/yi-tan/Unschooling
1:30 Eastern time, 12:30 Central, 11:30 Mountain, 10:30 Pacific

In poking around their links, though, I found that "webbrain" thing
and it's fun.

Sandra
